summary: If you have ever wanted a button to shut up Heimskri (The Talos priest in Whiterun), then this is the mod for you. Just hit the button and enjoy the show.
descriptionHtml:
If you have ever wanted a button to shut up Heimskri (The Talos priest in Whiterun), then this is the mod for you. Just hit the button and enjoy the show.

The button is located near the Talos statue in Whiterun. 

Installation just extract the file to the Skyrim Data directory or use the Nexus Mod Manager.
author: dude21002002
